sections.heading: Repealed.Section 21-15-2 - Repealed.Section 21-15-3 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 73-30-29, enacted by Laws 1967, ch. 66, § 1; repealed by Laws 1999, ch. 219 § 21.

Repeals.— Laws 1999, ch. 219 § 21 repealed 21-15-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1967, ch. 66, § 1, relating to purpose, effective July 1, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1998 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 73-30-30, enacted by Laws 1967, ch. 66, § 2; repealed by Laws 1999, ch. 219 § 21.

Repeals.— Laws 1999, ch. 219 § 21 repealed 21-15-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1967, ch. 66, § 2, relating to authorization for acquisition, effective July 1, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1998 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 73-30-31, enacted by Laws 1967, ch. 66, § 4; repealed by Laws 1999, ch. 219 § 21.

Repeals.— Laws 1999, ch. 219 § 21 repealed 21-15-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1967, ch. 66, § 4, relating to approval of operations, effective July 1, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1998 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
